message.body: Hi
Hey, what's going on?
Just chilling. You?
Same here. About to eat some food, do some work and then gather round with some folks for the Arrested Development.
Sounds like a fun day :)
How bout you, any plans for today or tomorrow?
No big plans, just relaxing with my boyfriend but it should be fun
Very nice. Getting outside to enjoy this ridonkulous weather at all?
Is it still cold?
No, it's warm out today. Think the wind might pick up a little bit, but the temp is around short sleeves or light long sleeves and jeans.
Just thought to ask, are you in Philly or elsewhere?
Nice! I might walk to get coffee then. I live in Philly in university city
Same here. Figured that could be the case considering the username.
Yup. You work at LDC too?
Regarding weather, I'm not a huge fan of sitting in parks and such when the weather's nice, but I really do enjoy walking around or biking.
I do I do.
Cool. I actually don't know how to ride a bike lol
Uh oh. Don't say that out loud around here. The crusties might lynch you.
Lol
It's ok, tho, I don't ride a fixy or anything, so I'll keep quiet.
What's a fixy?
Fixed gear bike. Popular amongst those in the biking community, of which I am not a part. I just enjoy riding.
Nice. Philly seems like a good city for bike riding
Definitely. Lots of bike lanes, trails, etc. Drivers can occasionally be not too nice, but what can you do. What's your primary transportation?
Walking lol. Or public transit. If I'm going somewhere outside those bounds, then zipcar
All good choices. I'm pretty much all walking and biking these days, very rarely PT. Also rare that I go beyond that unless I'm Greyhounding it.
Ahh I hate greyhound. Their service is terrible
Yeah, I've definitely sat at their terminal for hours, sometimes because they overbooked. But I'm generally content with a book and headphones.
That's good. Do you drive at all?
Not on my own. But I do drive long distance a lot travelling with other people. (traveling? hm not sure about those "l's")
Lol I think it's 2 ls. What places have you travelled to?
Sorry for the delay, things picked up and I never got a chance to respond last night. I mostly travel around the US and a bit in Canada. You?
No worries. I've been around the us, Mexico and Jamaica
Ah, nice. Both places that I've bever been to. How did you like them?
Great places to vacation. Out of all if the places I visited though, New Orleans was my favorite
Yeah, I've been there. Totally fun town.
What are some of your favorite places?
I would say that the Bay area in California is probably one of my faves. Chicago's really sweet, as are Austin, TX and Hot Springs, Arkansas.
I haven't been to any of those places. I've always wanted to try the pizza in Chicago though
